module.name: presentation_hierarchy
module.keywords: module, view, view area, presentation, styled model,

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of a presentation set, consisting of two-dimensional views of styled models.

inscope.li: association between product data defined by other application modules of ISO 10303 and presentation data;
hierarchical structuring of presentation data in sets, areas and view;
items within the scope of application module Appearance assignment, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1001;
items within the scope of application module Contextual shape positioning, ISO/TS 10303-1027.
